channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7fd69092-c9bc-4b59-9e2e-bca63317e147
Display name: App Configuration Data SAS User
Description: Allows the usage of SAS tokens for authentication.
Link: https://management.azure.com/7fd69092-c9bc-4b59-9e2e-bca63317e147?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 566f0da3-e2a5-4393-9089-763f8bab8fb6
Display name: Health Safeguards Data User
Description: Allows processing of health data in all available Health Safeguards
Link: https://management.azure.com/566f0da3-e2a5-4393-9089-763f8bab8fb6?api-version=2022-04-01
